content.question: Comparison Justification A <math alttext="K sub p is less than K sub E" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>E</mi></msub></mstyle></math> The total energy of the sphere-planet system is constant throughout the swing, and there is less potential energy in the sphere-planet system on the new planet.
